Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:庶

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+5EB6

Main pronunciation 主要发音: shù

Other pronunciations 其它发音: zhù,shù,zhē

Original meaning 本义: Meaning numerous

English senses 英语理解: numerous, various; multitude

Usage example 用法举例: 庶民 shù mín (the common people)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1779

Shuowen 说文解字: 屋下眾也從广炗炗古文光字臣鉉等曰光亦眾盛也

Component 庶 mutant 庻 from (rem+ 广 guǎng-yǎn) and (rem- 廿 niàn from 口) from rock-chime 石 shí and fire-dots 灬火 huǒ C537 庶<庻> simp 庶. (name- numerous 庶 shù)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- original meaning to cook with hot rocks 庶牛) (- now meaning "many") (- see 席)

庻字的基本解释

庻
shù
古同“庶”。

庻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shù］
［《廣韻》商署切，去御，書。］
亦作“庻1”。亦作“謶1”。
(1)众多。
(2)引申为普通，一般。参见“庶玉”。
(3)百姓，平民。
(4)非正妻生的孩子；宗族的旁支。与“嫡”相对。
(5)将近，差不多。
(6)副词。幸得，幸而。
(7)副词。希望，但愿。
(8)副词。或许，也许。
(9)姓。春秋时邾国有庶其。见《左传·襄公二十一年》。
[②]［zhù］
［《廣韻》章恕切，去御，章。］
亦作“庻2”。
煮。用蒸煮消除毒害。

庻字的康熙字典解释

shù

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shù］
["Guangyun" Department of Commerce cut, go to imperial, book. ]
Also known as "庻1". Also known as "謶1".
(1) Numerous.
(2) The extension is general and general. See "Shu Yu".
(3) Common people, common people.
(4) Children born to non-orthodox wives; offshoots of the clan. Contrast with "di".
(5) Nearly, almost.
(6) Adverbs. Fortunately, fortunately.
(7) Adverbs. Hope, hope.
(8) Adverbs. Maybe, maybe.
(9) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, the State-owned Sustained Qi. See "Twenty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Gong".
[②]［zhù］
["Guang Yun" Chapter Shu cut, go to the imperial, chapter. ]
Also known as "庻2".
cook. Use cooking to eliminate poison.
